dependencies.description: Basic Local Alignment Search Tool.
dependencies.name: blast-plus

dependencies.description:
GeneRax is a parallel tool for species tree-aware maximum likelihood
based gene family tree inference under gene duplication, transfer, and
loss.
dependencies.name: generax

dependencies.description: IBM MPI implementation from Spectrum MPI.
dependencies.name: mpi

dependencies.description:
MUSCLE is widely-used software for making multiple alignments of
biological sequences.
dependencies.name: muscle5

dependencies.description:
An open source Message Passing Interface implementation. The Open MPI
Project is an open source Message Passing Interface implementation that
is developed and maintained by a consortium of academic, research, and
industry partners. Open MPI is therefore able to combine the expertise,
technologies, and resources from all across the High Performance
Computing community in order to build the best MPI library available.
Open MPI offers advantages for system and software vendors, application
developers and computer science researchers.
dependencies.name: openmpi

dependencies.description:
A distributed collaborative effort to develop Python libraries and
applications which address the needs of current and future work in
bioinformatics.
dependencies.name: py-biopython

dependencies.description:
DendroPy is a Python library for phylogenetic computing. It provides
classes and functions for the simulation, processing, and manipulation
of phylogenetic trees and character matrices, and supports the reading
and writing of phylogenetic data in a range of formats, such as NEXUS,
NEWICK, NeXML, Phylip, FASTA, etc.
dependencies.name: py-dendropy

dependencies.description:
The Environment for Tree Exploration (ETE) is a Python programming
toolkit that assists in the recontruction, manipulation, analysis and
visualization of phylogenetic trees (although clustering trees or any
other tree-like data structure are also supported).
dependencies.name: py-ete3

dependencies.description:
Matplotlib is a comprehensive library for creating static, animated, and
interactive visualizations in Python.
dependencies.name: py-matplotlib

dependencies.description:
This package provides Python bindings for the Message Passing Interface
(MPI) standard. It is implemented on top of the MPI-1/MPI-2
specification and exposes an API which grounds on the standard MPI-2 C++
bindings.
dependencies.name: py-mpi4py

dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
dependencies.name: py-numpy

dependencies.description: A Python library to read/write Excel 2010 xlsx/xlsm files
dependencies.name: py-openpyxl

dependencies.description: Library for interacting with Open Tree of Life resources.
dependencies.name: py-opentree

dependencies.description:
pandas is a fast, powerful, flexible and easy to use open source data
analysis and manipulation tool, built on top of the Python programming
language.
dependencies.name: py-pandas

dependencies.description:
Ancestral character reconstruction and visualisation for rooted
phylogenetic trees.
dependencies.name: py-pastml

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description:
A minimalist tree manipulation and plotting library for use inside
jupyter notebooks. Toytree combines a popular tree data structure based
on the ete3 library with modern plotting tools based on the toyplot
plotting library.
dependencies.name: py-toytree

dependencies.description: A Fast, Extensible Progress Meter
dependencies.name: py-tqdm

dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.
dependencies.name: py-wheel

dependencies.description:
Library for developers to extract data from Microsoft Excel (tm)
spreadsheet files
dependencies.name: py-xlrd

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependencies.description:
RAxML-NG is a phylogenetic tree inference tool which uses maximum-
likelihood (ML) optimality criterion. Its search heuristic is based on
iteratively performing a series of Subtree Pruning and Regrafting (SPR)
moves, which allows to quickly navigate to the best-known ML tree.
RAxML-NG is a successor of RAxML (Stamatakis 2014) and leverages the
highly optimized likelihood computation implemented in libpll (Flouri et
al. 2014).
dependencies.name: raxml-ng

description: Python framework for doing ancestral sequence reconstruction.
name: py-topiary-asr

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
